tutorialSign 1: Use A and D to move, and left click to attack
Use W to charge your jump, then release to actually jump
If you have cheese on your stick and your cheese meter is less than full, you can eat the stick cheese using E
Some people in the tower can be talked to! just walk up to them nd press E
Well, that's all. I think that sus boi over there wants to talk to you
susBoi Entrance: I don't suppose you'd be interested in helping me clean up the tower's garbage, would you?
Better yet, at the top of the tower, there's a whole lotta cheese wheels.
We're going to the moon, not because it is easy, but because it is cheese.
susBoi Fields: I know, it's weird how there's an outdoor in the indoor, right?.
Just go climb that Tree, you should be able to parkour over that weird plastic building.
susBoi bossFightStart: Uh- So the cheese might have fallen into off the tower
But I do see it down there, so you could just... go get it
Just go take that lil' wormhole over there, it'll be quick drop
susBoi startFight: Or maybe you knew from the start. I'm not really subtle, heh.
You want this pile of cheese that badly?
garbageNPC 2: Dude, we eat garbage- We're cleaning up the mess! chill out!!!
garbageNPC 3: Haven't heard back from my brother trashicus the third for a weird amount of time...
